title: Mobile Project-Based Language Learning for Business Professionals

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational business terminology and mobile device proficiency
context.additional_context: A process focused on improving language application in business contexts through real-time collaboration and case analysis in a BYOD environment

learning_goals: Learners can utilize domain-specific (medical/legal/technical) language expressions with 80% accuracy through business scenario-based mobile projects.
Learners can generate and revise language solutions at least three times, incorporating real-time peer feedback via mobile platform collaboration tools.
Learners can apply over 50 core vocabulary items needed for business meetings/document writing contextually using micro-content (under 5 minutes).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
